meta.name: description
meta.source: The classic story of a little girl's journey to her grandmother's house and the big bad wolf she encounters in the forest on the way.
meta.target: La clásica historia del viaje de una niña a la casa de su abuela y el lobo feroz que encuentra en el bosque en el camino.

tuv.seg: who could never get enough of her.
quien nunca podía tener demasiado tiempo con ella.
and as it was very becoming to her,
and she never wore anything else,
y ella nunca le puso nada más,
and they will do her good.
and there would be none left
"I will be sure to take care,”
and gave her hand upon it.
y dio su mano para prometerlo.
but as she did not know what
so they will do her good,
"A quarter of an hour's walk from here;
"A pie, un cuarto de hora de aquí;
and you may know it by
y es posible que la conoces que
that are growing all round you,
que están creciendo alrededor de ti,
and I don't think you are listening to
y creo que no estás escuchando
just as if you were going
and it is so delightful out here
y así que corría por todos lados
she saw a still prettier one
and ate her up without saying
y le comió sin decir ni
y se tumbó en su cama,
was all this time running about among
durante todo eso, estaba corriendo entre
as many as she could hold,
todas las flores que podía llevar contigo,
and set off to go to
and I was so glad this morning to go
y estaba tan contenta esta mañana ir
so that she looked very odd.
what large ears you have got!”
what large eyes you have got!”
what big hands you have got!”
"The better to take hold of you with.”
what a terrible mouth you have got!”
And no sooner had the Wolf said it than
Y tan pronto como el Lobo lo ha dicho,
"¿Cómo está la mujer vieja roncando tan ruidosamente;
if there is anything the matter with her.”
And he made up his mind that
and that she might yet be saved.
and was going to rush away,
that she would never again wander
